name: premiership

premiership noun [C or U]
(POLITICS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the period when someone is prime minister, or the job of being prime minister

premiership noun [C or U]
(SPORT)
(also Premiership) the top football league (= group of competing teams) in England, consisting of 20 teams from England and Wales : The win put Arsenal back at the top of the Premiership. a premiership player Synonym
the Premier League
(also Premiership) the highest level competition for rugby union in England: Premiership rugby
